activities: NimbleCommerce operates a hosted ecommerce service that allows media companies to provide offers, products and services to their audience. We store customer, transaction and advertiser partner data for our clients.
eucountries: Denmark, Greece, Ireland, Netherlands, Norway, Spain, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer data, transaction data, financial data
recoursemech: We commit to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Community or their authorized representatives
